column5: Beautifully updated 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath condo that features 2 king, and 1 bunkbed that has a full and a twin to easily sleep 10. This unit has recently been updated that is certain to please. The unit is conveniently located next to the pool, this unit has its own laundry room with lots of storage. There is also 2 boat docks for your stay.
column8: PUENTE VISTA, UNIT 150 3 BDRM, 2.5 BTH, WATERFRONT
